name: Super Stickman (demo edition)
description:
(demo for a game. i've made about the first 5 rooms or so)

super stickman is a game about jumping. you jump and do stuff. I don't want to spoil the main storyline, so i'm going to save it for the main game. anyway, you can test out 5 levels of the game.

--controls--

arrow keys control movement

z to jump

r to restart game

l to load game

space while touching a red circle saves the game
